hadiths.text: Narrated Ibn `Abbas:I heard the Prophet (ﷺ) saying, "If the son of Adam (the human being) had two valleys of money, he would wish for a third, for nothing can fill the belly of Adam's son except dust, and Allah forgives him who repents to Him

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا يُتَّقَى مِنْ فِتْنَةِ الْمَالِ
chapter.eng-name: The Fitnah of wealth should be warded off
